input.sentences: my girlfriend and i arrived early to grandma 's birthday .
my little niece read to us .
she was so excited because it was her birthday too .
the adults were in the living room talking .
after awhile | we brought out the cake for grandma .
output.sentences: Today we went to my girlfriends grandmas birthday party.
We got to read to her niece.
Grandma was excited for everyone to come to her birhtday.
Every one took time to talk about life.
The cake we brought for her grandma was really nice.
